channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 03:27 Air anxiety in the Zhytomyr Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 03:27 Air anxiety in the Zhytomyr Oblast follow the following messages.#Zhytomyr This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
